John and Jenny, both in cap and gowns, drinking from plas champagne glasses. John displays the top of his cap to CAMERA: the words "NEED JOB" are spelled out in white adhesive tape.
The point is their love grew, blah blah blah... And that love continues tonight.
The wedding GUESTS APPLAUD, the lights come up, and Sebas concludes his toast. 6. 8 8 CONTINUED:

And now, please join me in raising a glass to my future neighbors down in Florida, and to the dawn of both a marriage end a brilliant journalistic team, the new Woodward and Bernstein, this time with sex. Bad sex, probably, but - anyway: to John and Jenny Grogan.

But I did, and I graduated with honors. Two years ago, my buddies told me that the most Jenny Havens would ever say to me was, You're sweet, but I don't like you in that way..
